Class ParentWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerview.Model.ParentWrapper

  • public class ParentWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    ParentWrapper object. This object is used as a helper to control expanded states and stable ids.

    5/27/2015
